segment.content:
Core4Basis Technology and Consulting Services is a consulting boutique SAP Basis
specialty firm. The company provides SAP system installation, upgrade, performance
optimization, security, backup, and cloud integration services. Its main goal is to assume
responsibility for customers' key infrastructures with best-in-class performance and
reliability.
During my internship, I was a very active member of the daily business processes of
the SAP Basis team. I learned checking the systems with the help of SAP GUI, preparing daily
and weekly reports, and performing backup controls and dump analyses. I also performed
user and authorization procedures. Besides that, I prepared weekly system status reports for
different clients, which included reading system logs, RFC connections, disk space usage,
memory space usage, and other important parameters.
A significant amount of my internship was devoted to being involved in the SAP
HANA patching process. Under the guidance of my supervisor, I performed full system
backups, downloaded the relevant .SAR files from SAP Support Portal, and uploaded them to
the respective directories. I powered down the system safely via SAP MMC and initiated the
update process through the hdblcm tool. I learned that careful planning, backup, and check
steps are so critical in system updates.
Moreover, I was taught SAP service management on the SUSE Linux and Windows
Server platforms by my supervisor. I learned to use terminal commands (df -h, top, ps -ef,
startsap, stopsap) and to work with directories. On the Windows platform, I was trained to
start and stop instances using SAP Management Console (SAP MMC) and to effectively
manage services.
Before the internship, my main goal was to learn more about SAP Basis
infrastructure and become familiar with the actual systems. This internship exceeded my
expectation. I learned the importance of regular system checks, proper documentation, and
collaboration in SAP system maintenance. In addition, I obtained experience which SAP Basis
requires as much technical knowledge as taking a high level of responsibility. This internship
assisted me in achieving technical skills and professional working ethics.
2

score.feedback: Özet, şirketin mühendislik faaliyetlerini, stajyerin yaptığı işleri (SAP GUI, raporlama, yedekleme, HANA patching), beklentiler ve sonuçları (SAP Basis hakkında bilgi edinme hedefi aşıldı) ve öğrenilenleri (sistem kontrolleri, dökümantasyon, işbirliği) açıkça belirtiyor. Spesifik araçlar (SAP GUI, hdblcm), platformlar (SUSE Linux, Windows Server) ve komutlar (df -h, top, ps -ef) belirtilmiş. Bu, içeriğin şirkete ve aktivitelere özgü olduğunu gösteriyor. Tüm anahtar unsurlar mevcut ve iyi dengelenmiş.
